title: The Lumineers are expert chefs when it comes to making songs together
description: In this session, The Lumineers talk about how they improvised more than ever while writing their latest album, Brightside.
itunes:title: The Lumineers are expert chefs when it comes to making songs together
itunes:author: Raina Douris
